name: Pleated Short Pants
description: High-waisted shorts with zipper closure, featuring convenient diagonal pockets on both sides. Designed with loose straight legs. The highlight is the eye-catching belt detail combined with raised pleats. Made from soft Tuysi fabric that's easy to wear with good absorption. The fabric fibers are very light and smooth, providing absolute comfort when worn. Pair with a blouse or t-shirt for a dynamic summer outfit.

name: Tuysi Folded Hem Shorts
description: High-waisted shorts with a hidden front zipper and raised button. 2 convenient diagonal side pockets. Wide straight leg, folded hem design creates an accent. The shorts are designed with soft Tuysi fabric, easy to wear, with good absorption. The fabric fibers are very light and soft, providing absolute comfort when wearing. You can combine it with a blouse or t-shirt for a dynamic summer outfit.

name: High-waisted Rayon Shorts
description: Perfect design for office ladies looking for a youthful and personalized outfit while maintaining elegance and grace. Youthful shorts that flatter the wearer's figure. Mix with MS 61M8698 to create a fashionable and modern set. The product combines three premium materials: Rayon, Poly, and Spandex, providing a smooth, comfortable texture that creates a soft feeling when touched. Additionally, the material has natural draping properties and water resistance, offering breathability for summer comfort. The feminine trend is combined by IVY moda between elegant, luxurious beauty while emphasizing comfort and ease from fit to soft material. Not only beautiful in design and material, the blazer is also highly practical, suitable for ladies to wear at the office and events.

name: Loose pants with bow belt
description: Wide-leg loose pants with ankle length for a flattering silhouette. Design features side pockets and pleats on the front. High-waisted pants with a feminine bow detail. With these straight-leg pants, ladies can easily mix and match with different types of tops suitable for daily wear, work, or casual outings.

name: Loose pants with button detail waistband
description: Loose pants made from soft and lightweight Tuysi fabric, comfortable and good at hiding flaws, helping you feel confident whenever you appear. The pants feature a high waist, front pleats, and a stylish belt with two decorative covered buttons. Designed with side pockets and ankle-length cut. The pants can be paired with various types of tops to create neat and elegant outfits.

name: Straight pants with metal belt
description: Straight pants made from soft and lightweight Tuysi fabric, comfortable, good at hiding flaws helping you feel confident whenever appearing. The pants have a high waist, fixed pleats, with a metal belt. Design with two side pockets and ankle-length. The pants can be combined with different types of tops to create neat and polite outfits.

name: Flared Tuysi Pants with Split Hem
description: Long flared pants with high waist, ankle-length. The pants hem features a slight side split with decorative metal buttons for accent. The Tuysi material effectively maintains shape and doesn't stick to sweat, ensuring comfort when wearing. Suitable to pair with shirts, blouses, and accessories to create an elegant look for office wear or a stylish appearance for work, meetings, or important gatherings.

name: Quần Tuysi ống đứng
description: Quần ống đứng cạp cao, độ dài trên ngang mắt cá chân. Ống có độ ôm nhẹ, thanh lịch, trẻ trung. Thiết kế 2 túi chéo sườn. Chất liệu Tuysi thoáng mát và thấm hút mồ hôi tốt. Hơn nữa còn giữ f quần suốt cả ngày dài.

name: Front-slit Straight Tuysi Pants
description: High-waisted pleated pants with two convenient side pockets. Straight leg with front slit at the hem. The waistband design creates a focal point when tucked in with tops. Made from slightly stretchy Tuysi material, providing comfort when worn.

name: Flared Tuysi Pants with Belt Mix
description: Flared pants with length reaching the ankle. Features a high-rise, wide waistband design with hidden zipper. The upper part has a slight fitted silhouette that enhances the hip area and creates an excellent leg-lengthening effect. The lower part features an elegant, trendy flared design. The pants have a distinctive waist belt detail that looks especially beautiful when tucked in. Made from soft and lightweight Tuysi fabric, comfortable to wear, with a design that effectively conceals flaws, helping you feel confident whenever you appear. Perfect to mix with shirts or t-shirts to complete your outfit for work or casual occasions.

name: Plain Tuysi Straight Pants
description: As part of the URBAN CHIC collection launching SPRING/SUMMER 2024 NEW COLLECTION, this design carries the mission of creating flexible transformation in new fashion. To build emotional and mental connections through gentle touch points from soft fabric, precisely fitted silhouette, and bringing comfortable softness. Using lightweight, comfortable Tuysi fabric, the design effectively conceals flaws helping you feel confident whenever appearing. Pants feature fixed pleats, two side pockets and ankle-length. Meticulous design with unique waistband emphasis featuring novel folded seams. Office ladies can combine with different types of tops to create neat and polite outfits.

name: Straight Leg Tuysi Pants
description: High-waisted straight leg Tuysi pants with length above ankle. The leg has a slight fit, elegant front pleats, youthful design. 2 diagonal pockets on both sides. The pants design is suitable for pairing with various items, from elegant office wear with shirts to dynamic youthful looks with t-shirts. Tuysi material is breathable and has good sweat absorption. Moreover, it maintains the pants' shape throughout the day.

name: Beige Jeans
description: Women's jeans are a basic item, easily combined with different types of tops and accessories. With comfort and style, the pants are suitable for various occasions from work to street wear or casual events. High-waisted design with straight legs hides flaws well, helps accentuate the waistline and makes the body shape slimmer. Made of sturdy and durable denim material. The pants have certain elasticity, helping to fit the body comfortably when wearing.

name: Front Slit Flared Pants
description: High-waisted pleated pants with two convenient side pockets. Flared leg with front slit at the hem. Secured with a hidden front zipper. Flared pants, also known as bell-bottoms, were popular in the 1960s and 1970s. With timeless sophistication, when mixed with shirts or t-shirts, they create a unique personality. Don't forget to accessorize!

name: French Set Wide-leg Pants
description: The long pleated wide-leg pants help accentuate curves and create a comfortable, relaxed feeling for the wearer. Choose to mix with MS 61M8355 to create a perfect outfit for dates, parties or work.

name: Baggy pants with accessories
description: Baggy style pants, made from soft Tuysi fabric that holds its shape. Two diagonal side pockets with a metal chain accent on one side. Hidden side zipper closure.
